Charlene Weiß

Postdoc in mathematics at Paderborn University

Home Research CV Teaching Contact

At Paderborn University, I was a teaching assistant for several courses (all taught in German), see below.

In 2020, the Faculty of Electronic Engineering, Computer Science and Mathematics of Paderborn University awarded me the Weierstraß-Prize for excellent teaching.

Taught exercise courses:

  • Lineare Algebra 2 (for bachelor’s students, WiSe 2022/2023).

  • Algebraische Kombinatorik—Assoziationsschemata (for master’s students, SoSe 2022).

  • Kombinatorik (for master’s students, WiSe 2021/2022).

  • Lineare Algebra für Informatiker (for bachelor’s students, SoSe 2021).

  • Codierungstheorie (for bachelor’s students, WiSe 2020/2021).

  • Algebra (for bachelor’s students, SoSe 2020).

  • Analysis für Informatiker (for bachelor’s students, WiSe 2019/2020).

  • Lineare Algebra 2 (for bachelor’s students, SoSe 2019).

  • Lineare Algebra 1 (for bachelor’s students, WiSe 2018/2019).

  • Algebraische Kombinatorik—Assoziationsschemata (for master’s students, SoSe 2018).

  • Kombinatorik (for master’s students, WiSe 2017/2018).
